messages.message:
Hi everyone,

We are migrating our *Prod* environment onto *Deployments Manager* in order to be consistent with our other internal environments. The migration is scheduled for this *Wednesday 12/7* *9:30PM Eastern (6:30PM Pacific, 8:00AM IST)*. There will be some downtime during this time. We don't anticipate the migration to take more than a couple hours. Further updates will be made in this channel.
